line: Lady Trianne, what exactly happened just now?

speaker: Trianne
line: Trianne and Memmy were looking around to see if there were any mechanisms nearby...

speaker: Trianne
line: But just as they went to take a closer look at that big piece of amber, they were surrounded!

speaker: Castorice
line: ...I see.

speaker: Castorice
line: Let's get a move on. The orbs belonging to Oronyx 's priests should be nearby... Hopefully, they'll be of some use.

speaker: Mem
line: I'll... leave it in your capable hands...!

speaker: Mem
line: Before I'm cooked... let me first think about how to apologize... *sniffle*

text: Try to reach where Mem is and rescue Mem

speaker: Mem
line: Bloop bloop bloop...

speaker: Mem
line: Bloop bloop bloop bloop...

speaker: Mem
line: My fur... still drying...

speaker: Trianne
line: It's connected! Let's hurry! Memmy is already bouncing around due to the heat!

speaker: Mem
line: N—No... This is a sweet little dance to express my apologies...!

text: (Use the Miracle Orb to illuminate the lily pads during the Night)

speaker: Mem
line: I see water lilies floating in the sky... So cool! Can we walk on it?

speaker: Mem
line: So warm... much comfort...

text: (Descend on the flower to Mem's level)

speaker: Castorice
line: Oh no, I'm starting to smell something delicious.

speaker: Mem
line: Haha... That must be because I can't help giving off an irresistible charm.

speaker: Mem
line: You're finally here, friend! I've been waiting for a while now...

speaker: Mem
line: Let's surround them! It's time to give this bunch of ungentlemanly fools a taste of my fiery and fatal allure!

text: Defeat the magical beasts surrounding Mem

speaker: Mem
line: I'm burning hot right now...

speaker: Mem
line: It feels like I've reached medium-well... No, perhaps I'm on the verge of becoming well-done...!

speaker: Mem
line: Precision, and grace. That did not take much effort... Was this supposed to be a challenge?

speaker: Mem
line: ...Just kidding! I just wanted to marvel at how (Trailblazer) and Cas always manage to resolve crises so effortlessly.

text: I'm just so-so, only third best, ya know?

children.speaker: Mem
children.line: Friend, you're too humble! In that case, I'll just have to settle for being second best while Cas can be the best.

children.speaker: Mem
children.line: Oh, right! Sorry, I forgot about Trianne.

children.speaker: Trianne
children.line: It's all right! Trianne only just flew down.

speaker: Castorice
line: I'm glad that everyone is alright. Speaking of which, this piece of amber is...?

speaker: Calypso
line: ...A remnant of Mnestia 's Coreflame.

speaker: Calypso
line: To get to the throne at the treetop, gather the embers before you with the Golden Bough of Vows and present it to the divine butterfly.

speaker: Trianne
line: Whoa... Where did you come from!?

speaker: Castorice
line: You finally appeared... Lady Calypso.

speaker: Calypso
line: Yes... It's been some time. The battle just now was a true delight, and I feel quite elated...

speaker: Calypso
line: ...It seems like I'll really be able to rely on all of you to reclaim my true form.

speaker: Castorice
line: ...Lady Trianne, how does the golden thread react to her?

speaker: Trianne
line: Mmm...

speaker: Trianne
line: There's... no reaction at all.

speaker: Calypso
line: Hehe, obviously. After all, the fragment that you picked up just now is completely unrelated to me.

speaker: Calypso
line: Alright, just do as I say. If you're able to pass the trial, I will tell you everything truthfully.

speaker: Castorice
line: Another trial...

speaker: Mem
line: Come on, I hate people who don't finish their thoughts!

speaker: Trianne
line: But we have to go to the treetop to find Nax anyway, right?

speaker: Castorice
line: I've got a hunch. Come, let's collect the embers and go confront her.

text: Pick the remaining fires with the Golden Bough of Vows

speaker: Castorice
line: According to Calypso, we just have to "gather the embers before us with the Golden Bough of Vows"...

text: As the golden water lily touches the amber, flames spill from its petals.
Curiously, the fire does not consume the entire flower. Only faint sparks gather at the tips, subtly burning.
Offer the remaining fires to the Butterfly of Divine Mind

speaker: Castorice
line: How incredible...

speaker: Mem
line: Uhh, so... We just have to present it to the butterfly?

speaker: Calypso
line: Hehe, it seems like you managed to gather the embers.

speaker: Calypso
line: In that case... just offer it to the divine butterfly.

speaker: Castorice
line: It'll be fine. Let's just do as she says.

text: (Offer the faintly burning Golden Bough of Vows.)

speaker: Trianne
line: It's a success! The path has appeared...

speaker: Calypso
line: Heh... All of you have indeed passed the trial.

speaker: Mnestia's Illusion
line: *Titan's sad cries*

speaker: Castorice
line: Hmm? The sound of a butterfly's wings...

speaker: Mnestia's Illusion
line: *Titan's sad cries*

speaker: Calypso
line: I'll be back shortly.

speaker: Mnestia's Illusion
line: *Titan's sad cries*

speaker: Calypso
line: Of course, our promise still stands...

speaker: Calypso
line: But now... It's time for me to sacrifice myself.

speaker: Mnestia's Illusion
line: *Titan's sad cries*

speaker: Calypso
line: Hehe...

speaker: Calypso
line: If the west wind ever ends, let that be the place where we reunite.

speaker: Calypso
line: Farewell... my love.

speaker: Castorice
line: Lady Calypso, this is...

speaker: Calypso
line: Haha... It's nothing much.

speaker: Calypso
line: Thank you so much for your help. Now it's time for me to fulfill my part of the promise.

speaker: Castorice
line: Well, in that case, I can start...

speaker: Castorice
line: You're... actually Cerces , right?

speaker: Mem
line: Wh—What's going on? You're the Titan?

speaker: Cerces
line: Oh my, the children of humanity... have passed the final trial at last.

speaker: Cerces
line: I was wondering when you were planning to expose me. How did you know?

speaker: Castorice
line: The riddle-like trials, your distrustful yet sincere character, referring to Mnestia as your love, and...

speaker: Castorice
line: The head of the Lotophagists is actually called Medea and not Calypso.

speaker: Cerces
line: Since you knew from the start that I was not who I said I was, why did you wait until now to expose me?

speaker: Castorice
line: Because I did not believe that Cerces would walk this world in a human form. I was also afraid that the Titans were under the control of the black tide and would do us harm...

speaker: Castorice
line: Also, "to make a claim, one must have evidence" — this is the precious knowledge that I acquired during my time at the Grove.

speaker: Cerces
line: Heh... Excellent. To think we were able to gain a new chance at life in the midst of death — fate truly is a mysterious thing.

speaker: Castorice
line: Well... Shouldn't you also tell us why you went through all the trouble of setting up these riddles?

speaker: Cerces
line: Oh, the reason's quite simple.

speaker: Cerces
line: I needed your help, and just like how you were wary of me, I had to ensure that you were not villains who were trying to get their hands on the Coreflame. I also had to ascertain that you were capable of dealing with the threat at hand.

speaker: Castorice
line: Is this threat related to the black tide?

speaker: Cerces
line: Indeed, and it's even more related to that lost item from before. Its owner is a quiet and paranoid hunter who seems to have been reborn from the black tide and is attacking along with it.

speaker: Cerces
line: As I could not do anything about him, I split my body up and escaped to avoid harm. I bided my time for a chance to seek assistance. Unfortunately, this was not a sustainable long-term plan.

speaker: Trianne
line: Uh... What you mean is that you hid your own Coreflame?

speaker: Cerces
line: Indeed, I split it into three. I hid one within the Golden Bough of Vows, and sealed another in the amber along with Mnestia 's remaining embers...

speaker: Cerces
line: As for the last one... It's currently in Anaxa's body, which is in dire need of repair .

speaker: Castorice
line: What? Do you mean that, you're using such a method...

speaker: Cerces
line: Hehe, after all, the scholars of the Grove have always been willing to lay down their lives to defend my Coreflame... As a respected god, it would be too embarrassing if I were to do nothing and simply watch the children of humanity give up their lives for me.

speaker: Cerces
line: Especially that heretic named Anaxa. He did not even hesitate to tear his soul apart and use it to perform a miracle. He trapped all the creations of the black tide within the Grove so that they would not be able to harm others.

speaker: Cerces
line: His way of thinking was so out of the ordinary that I felt it would be a waste for him to meet his demise in the black tide. And so, I decided to save his life.

speaker: Cerces
line: Of course, this also meant that I was able to conceal myself and remain hidden... Well, that's also an "equivalent exchange," right?

speaker: Mem
line: Ah, I finally understand! So, you want us to lend you a hand in piecing your Coreflame back together! We'll also be able to save Anaxa that way!

speaker: Cerces
line: What a smart little bunny. This way, I'll be able to regain my true form, and you will be able to bring the Coreflame and your teacher back to Okhema...

speaker: Cerces
line: ...We'll also take down the black-robed swordmaster at the throne, together in one go.

speaker: Trianne
line: But... Cerces, aren't you the Reason Titan?

speaker: Cerces
line: Heh... Even if I do not have the authority of Strife, I'm still a god.

speaker: Cerces
line: I just need you to buy me some time against the warrior's blade... Once the Coreflame is re-formed, I'll be able to show my hand.

text: Just leave it to me. Buying time is my specialty.
Let's take him down in one go!

speaker: Cerces
line: Excellent. Then, just continue climbing to reach my throne.

speaker: Cerces
line: Turn the Golden Bough of Vows into firewood to reignite the Coreflame of Reason...

text: Climb upwards and reach the Luminary Throne

title: Step Description
content: After careful observation, Castorice exposes Calypso's true identity asCerces. Cerces admits to this and asks (Trailblazer)'s group to help them reach Anaxa, so they can fuse the Coreflame again to catch the culprit behind the annihilation of the Grove — the nameless black-robed swordmaster.

speaker: Cerces
line: I'll leave it to you, children of humanity. May you be blessed with good fortune.

speaker: Castorice
line: It seems like... a fierce battle will be inevitable.

speaker: Trianne
line: Don't worry! Trianne will protect everyone!

speaker: Castorice
line: Ahead lies the Luminary Throne...

speaker: Castorice
line: And also... the battlefield that we're about to step onto.

speaker: Mem
line: Ah, this...

speaker: Mem
line: Friends, can you feel it?

speaker: Trianne
line: Memmy, what's wrong?

speaker: Mem
line: The memories here have a very intense smell...

speaker: Mem
line: ...It's the scent of bulrush, sand, and the blazing sun.

speaker: Castorice
line: Is this...

speaker: Castorice
line: Professor Anaxa...

text: Keep moving forward and meet up with Cerces at the throne

speaker: Anaxa
line: Ha... My eyes can no longer see...

speaker: Anaxa
line: No matter... All I have to do is to place this body at the core of the array...

speaker: Anaxa
line: For the sake of Amphoreus... Die with me, Titan.

speaker: Mem
line: Ah...

speaker: Castorice
line: Cerces was right. He's indeed here.

speaker: Trianne
line: Who is this black-robed guy...?

speaker: Mem
line: This person is the source of the smell and the memory... No, he's basically the memory itself!

speaker: Mem
line: The burning paradise, the shattered sun, and...

speaker: Mem
line: ...Carnage. Death and destruction.

speaker: Castorice
line: Everyone, brace yourself... This must be the hunter reborn from the black tide that Cerces was talking about...

speaker: Castorice
line: The black sword and cloak...

speaker: Castorice
line: The owner of the piece of cloth... The north wind that sent over the deathly fog of Thanatos .
You're not... demigods.
Stand down. Or die.

speaker: Mem
line: Quick... run! It's just us... We won't be able to defeat them...

text: Things will get better when the Titan attacks.

children.speaker: Castorice
children.line: That's right, let's do our best to buy time for Cerces .

text: I—Is there still time for us to escape now...

children.speaker: Castorice
children.line: He has already discovered us... Let's do our best to buy time for Cerces .

speaker: Trianne
line: T—Trianne will also protect everyone! Trianne is brave!

speaker: Castorice
line: ▶ ( Mr. / Miss ) (Trailblazer)...

speaker: Castorice
line: Only this time... may Death protect us!

speaker: Castorice
line: Be careful.
One slash.
Two slashes.
Three slashes... are enough

speaker: Castorice
line: Who exactly are you...?

text: (When ??? begins their turn for the 2nd time)

speaker: Castorice
line: So powerful... Cerces was right...

speaker: Mem
line: Where is she? Is the Coreflame still not pieced together yet!?

text: (When ??? begins their turn for the 3th time)

line: Offer your souls... to the fire.

speaker: Castorice
line: Not good...!
Be reduced to... ashes!

speaker: Castorice
line: In that case...

speaker: Anaxa?
line: Can't be killed in a single blow...

speaker: Anaxa?
line: You are indeed no ordinary human.

speaker: Anaxa?
line: How annoying. Children of humanity, don't waver now. Let's just destroy them one by one.

speaker: Anaxa?
line: Since the ambush failed, it'll be difficult to find another opportunity... What a pity.

speaker: Castorice
line: Professor Anaxa? No... It's Cerces ?

speaker: Mem
line: You're finally here! I missed you so much!

speaker: Anaxa?
line: Heh, I'm about to be overwhelmed. Fighting is so much more tiring than thinking.

speaker: Castorice
line: Everyone, watch each other's back!

speaker: Anaxa?
line: That was tough... I'm truly exhausted.

speaker: Trianne
line: Wait, no... Look out, everyone!

speaker: Castorice
line: This is bad...

speaker: Trianne
line: Century gate...

speaker: Trianne
line: Open!
